div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 439 Scarisoara, c. 33 km. SE of Bucharest, Rumania, 1950-1952 Burial: c. 300 B.C. Contents: 11+ AR. Pot hoard Istrus: 9 dr. Imit. Philip II: 2 tetradr. Disposition: Oltenita Preda, Dacia 1966, pp. 221-35, illus.; SCN 4 (1968), pp. 441-2, illus.
